com.upgrad.pgpbde.project.map.reduce

Class SaavnStreamingReducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<SaavnStreamingKey,SaavnStreamingValue,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable>
      • com.upgrad.pgpbde.project.map.reduce.SaavnStreamingReducer

  • public class SaavnStreamingReducer
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<SaavnStreamingKey,SaavnStreamingValue,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable>
    The SaavnStreamingReducer class is an implementation of the Reducer class which is used to aggregate the map output which is partitioned based on trendingDay .

    All the reduce outputs i.e. 07 files contains the top 100 trending songs for each day.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer

        org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer.Context

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanup(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer.Context context)
      The implementation of the cleanup() method called only once for a reducer emits all 100 songs sorted by descending of songWeight for each day from 25th December to 31st December
      void reduce(SaavnStreamingKey key, java.lang.Iterable<SaavnStreamingValue> valueList, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer.Context context)
      An implementation of the reduce() method in the Reducer class SaavnStreamingReducer which aggregates trending songs based on the weight assigned to each song.

      • Methods inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer
